EmailTemplate.name: Nymbus Partnership - Final Reminder.Email #1
EmailTemplate.subject: ⏰There’s still time! Get help applying for Paycheck Protection loans
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Dear valued customer}},
You still have time to apply for the SBA Paycheck Protection Program for your small business. A new stimulus bill has passed through the Senate this week and is going through the House next for approval. In advance of the bill passing, you can still apply for the loan now.
If you’re eligible, it provides cash assistance you can use to cover:
We’ve partnered with NYMBUS SmartLenders to help small business owners like you gain access to critical resources to help keep commerce running. They can help you through the whole application process.
Loan program details:
- 100% federally guaranteed loans - Small businesses (<500 employees) who maintain their payroll during this emergency are eligible to apply - Retroactive to February 15, 2020, so you can bring back any laid-off workers ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Got questions? Check out our FAQ first <[[https://www.ncr.com/coronavirus/nymbus-smb-relief]]>.
